item.title: Payment Processing Systems
item.description: Heritage Payment Solutions provides payment processing for every type of business. From full-service systems to card readers, we have a solution for you.

item.description: Heritage Payment Solutions provides payment processing systems that work for your company!

item.title: 1stPayPOS
item.description: Our 1stPayPOS allows quick payment processing for restaurants and retailers with an integrated payment and inventory experience for higher efficiency.

item.title: EMV & NFC Switchover
item.description: Don't let Europay, Mastercard, and Visa (EMV) changes leave your business behind. Heritage Payment Solutions offers security with EMV and NFC payments.

item.title: The Future Looks Promising
item.description: Heritage Payment Solutions is always looking for partnership opportunities. Contact us to learn more.

item.title: Card Payment Services
item.description: Heritage Payment Solutions offers electronic payment processing that best suits your business. For credit, debit, EBT, check verification and more, contact us!

item.title: Product Solutions
item.description: Heritage Payment Solutions offers electronic payment processing that best suits your business.

item.title: Industries Served
item.description: Heritage Payment Solutions serves the following industries: retail, restaurants, medical practices, non-profits, and professional offices.

item.title: Value Added Solutions
item.description: Our value-added solutions include ACH, cash advance & business loans, breach protection, PCI compliance, check guarantee and electronic conversion.

item.title: North State Bank and Heritage Payment Solutions
AMS
item.description: Heritage Payment Solutions offers streamlined patient payments and reduce time & data entry errors for medical practices and healthcare providers.
